content: Yes, there are several companies providing consultancy services in the area you are planning to enter. Some of these companies might have a focus on specific industries, such as manufacturing or AEC, and offer services related to digitalization and implementation of technology like BIM, CAD, and CAM. These companies are providing similar services to what you are planning to offer, and you may face competition from them. However, with a well-defined target market, unique selling proposition, and a focus on delivering high-quality services, you can differentiate yourself from the competition and establish a successful business.
